title: How to deactivate my Airtel broadband online - Quora

response.answer_text: “CORRECT ANSWER IS RIGHT HERE” Just call “121” form. your airtel registered number Follow the IVR instructions to your fixed line account deactivation process Then it should ask you to enter your “Airtel Account Number”. Now mind you, your fixed line number Or dsl number is not your airtel account number. Check for the confirmation slip that was given to you at the time of installation of the broadband by the person who installed the broadband at your house, on that slip there would be a number Written as Account number which will be different from your Dsl number and Fixed line number. If you couldn't find your confirmation slip or may be lost it, just look for your detailed bill in airtel thanx app, there will be a number listed as “Relationship Number”. That “Relationship Number” is your “Airtel account number”. Enter that number, then it will ask for your landline number. Enter the landline number with the STD code and you are good to go. I successfully temporarily deactivated my airtel broadband recently and hence I know it to be correct for sure. I hope it helps. Thank you. Kindly Upvote.

I just deactivated my airtel broadband connection a few days ago, so I think I can answer this question.
